description: Allows to disable two-factor authentication for the user account

twoFaToken.description: The token that was included in the error response when authenticating.

password.description: The current user password that can be used in place of the twoFaToken (e.g. when authenticating with user/password or during a change password workflow).

twoFaResetToken.description: The signed token that was sent to the user email.
